  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter 

    public class Checklist_Create_Item_Adapter
extends Checklist_Item_ArrayAdapter
    Version:
    1.0v Build * March 18 2015 *

    Description: The data source for the checklist create item listview. Provides the listeners for displaying item details and deletion upon clicking the checkbox.

    Author:
    David Krawchuk
